channel.title: MMORPG's I played (a lot), with comments and pics :)
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Maple Story[/size] [b]Price: [/b]Free with cash shop [b]Score: [/b]7/10 [b]Comments: [/b]This game is very cool in the beginning and such, but once you reached lvl 20, it's going super slow to level, and gets boring. [b]Site: [/b] http://mapleglobal.com [img]http://www.markeedragon.com/screenshots/data/3049/2MapleStory-screenshot-FireShock-111361757812-med.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Rose Online[/size] [b]Price: [/b]about 8$/month [b]Score: [/b]9.5/10 [b]Comments: [/b]This game is for me the best MMORPG EVER! I played it when it was open beta... You can choose from 4 classes (Hawker, Soldier, Muse and Dealer) to choose from. [b]Site: [/b] http://roseonlinegame.com/ [img]http://www.play-mmorpg.com/mmorpg/img/rose.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Conquer online[/size] [b]Price: [/b]Totally free [b]Score: [/b]6/10 [b]Comments: [/b]This game is not really good in graphics, but the gameplay is quiet nice, gets boring after a while tho [b]Site: [/b] http://www.conqueronline.com/ [img]http://www.conqueronline.com/gallery/images/screenshot_0001l.JPG[/img]
[size=15pt]Anarchy online[/size] [b]Price: [/b]Free, but resets every year (unless you pay) [b]Score: [/b]8/10 [b]Comments: [/b]I didn't like this game, because it is Sci-Fi, and I like mmorpg's to be fantasy, medieval... This game was first P2P, but on 1 january 2006, they made it free... [b]Site: [/b] http://www.anarchy-online.com/ [img]http://www.anarchy-online.com/content/downloads/media/screenshots/archive/050309_05.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Gunbound[/size] [b]Price: [/b]Free, with cash shop [b]Score: [/b]5/10 [b]Comments: [/b]This is a turn-based game (bit like worms), I don't like it, u need to wait constant :p [b]Site: [/b] http://www.softnyx.net/ [img]http://images.5star-network.com/screenshots/large/g/u/gunbound.gif[/img]
[size=15pt]Pristontale[/size] [b]Price: [/b]Free, untill lvl 40 (?) [b]Score: [/b]8/10 [b]Comments: [/b]Quiet nice [b]Site: [/b] http://eng.pristontale.com [img]http://www.play-free-online-games.com/listmachine/uploads/image_pristontale_1.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Lineage II[/size] [b]Price: [/b]P2P, but theres a test server [b]Score: [/b]9/10 [b]Comments: [/b]I played this game on a private server... Has a lot of cool features, I didn't get bored of it :) [b]Site: [/b] http://lineage2.com [img]http://www.theurbanwire.com/stories/images/stories/lineage2_pg4_2.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Fly for fun[/size] [b]Price: [/b]F2P with cash shop [b]Score: [/b]?/10 [b]Comments: [/b]My friend said to me: play it, but when I played, I had this huge lag, so i removed it :p (it looks like a great game tho) [b]Site: [/b] http://flyff.com [img]http://ff.163.com/images/news/b/04090302_01.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Kal online[/size] [b]Price: [/b]F2P with cash shop [b]Score: [/b]8/10 [b]Comments: [/b]I played this long time ago with lot of friends, never bored me [b]Site: [/b] http://www.kalonline.com/ [img]http://www.3000fr.com/forum/3000-img-foru/kal/kal-online-scr1.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Gunz online[/size] [b]Price: [/b]F2P [b]Score: [/b]8.5/10 [b]Comments: [/b]I liked this game much [b]Site: [/b] http://www.gunzonline.com [img]http://lordhell.bloguje.cz/gunz.JPG[/img]
I played a lot more games, but those are the major ones I didn't take the pictures, they are Â© to their respective owners

item.title: MMORPG's I played (a lot), with comments and pics :)
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

[size=15pt]Maple Story[/size]
Price: Free with cash shop
Score: 7/10
Comments: This game is very cool in the beginning and such, but once you reached lvl 20, it’s going super slow to level, and gets boring.
Site: http://mapleglobal.com

[size=15pt]Rose Online[/size]
Price: about 8$/month
Score: 9.5/10
Comments: This game is for me the best MMORPG EVER! I played it when it was open beta…
You can choose from 4 classes (Hawker, Soldier, Muse and Dealer) to choose from.
Site: http://roseonlinegame.com/

[size=15pt]Conquer online[/size]
Price: Totally free
Score: 6/10
Comments: This game is not really good in graphics, but the gameplay is quiet nice, gets boring after a while tho
Site: http://www.conqueronline.com/

[size=15pt]Anarchy online[/size]
Price: Free, but resets every year (unless you pay)
Score: 8/10
Comments: I didn’t like this game, because it is Sci-Fi, and I like mmorpg’s to be fantasy, medieval… This game was first P2P, but on 1 january 2006, they made it free…
Site: http://www.anarchy-online.com/

[size=15pt]Gunbound[/size]
Price: Free, with cash shop
Score: 5/10
Comments: This is a turn-based game (bit like worms), I don’t like it, u need to wait constant
Site: http://www.softnyx.net/

[size=15pt]Pristontale[/size]
Price: Free, untill lvl 40 (?)
Score: 8/10
Comments: Quiet nice
Site: http://eng.pristontale.com

image_pristontale_1.jpg800×600

[size=15pt]Lineage II[/size]
Price: P2P, but theres a test server
Score: 9/10
Comments: I played this game on a private server… Has a lot of cool features, I didn’t get bored of it
Site: http://lineage2.com

[size=15pt]Fly for fun[/size]
Price: F2P with cash shop
Score: ?/10
Comments: My friend said to me: play it, but when I played, I had this huge lag, so i removed it (it looks like a great game tho)
Site: http://flyff.com

[size=15pt]Kal online[/size]
Price: F2P with cash shop
Score: 8/10
Comments: I played this long time ago with lot of friends, never bored me
Site: http://www.kalonline.com/

kal-online-scr1.jpg772×582

[size=15pt]Gunz online[/size]
Price: F2P
Score: 8.5/10
Comments: I liked this game much
Site: http://www.gunzonline.com

I played a lot more games, but those are the major ones
I didn’t take the pictures, they are Â© to their respective owners

Read full topic
item.source: MMORPG's I played (a lot), with comments and pics :)
